paragraphs.title: HDFS pig 전처리 완료된 파일을 읽어옴
HDFS에서 데이터를 읽어온다
데이터 전처리 데이터 SQL 테스트
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select movie_id, movie_name, rating, review_id, review_txt, 
case 
when rating between 1 and 4 then 0 
when rating between 5 and 8 then 2 
else 1 
end as label 
from movies
where 
rating between 1 and 4 
or rating between 9 and 10

paragraphs.title: 데이터 변환 - Feature Engineering
paragraphs.text:
val sqlTrans = new SQLTransformer().setStatement(
  "select movie_id, movie_name, rating, review_id, review_txt, case when rating between 1 and 4 then 0 when rating between 5 and 8 then 2 else 1 end as label FROM __THIS__ where rating between 1 and 4 or rating between 9 and 10")

val movies1 = sqlTrans.transform(movies)
movies1.createOrReplaceTempView("movies")
movies1.show()

%sql
select rating, count(1) 
from movies
where rating < 11
group by rating
order by rating

%sql
select movie_name, count(1) as cnt
from movies
group by movie_name
order by cnt desc
limit 30

paragraphs.title: Feature 추출 - 토크나이저, 벡터라이저, IDF, Word2Vec
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.{CountVectorizer, IDF, Word2Vec}
import org.apache.spark.ml.Pipeline
import com.github.uosdmlab.nkp.Tokenizer

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer().setInputCol("review_txt").setOutputCol("words")
val cv = new CountVectorizer().setInputCol("words").setOutputCol("tf")
val idf = new IDF().setInputCol("tf").setOutputCol("tfidf")
val w2v = new Word2Vec().setInputCol("words").setOutputCol("vector").setVectorSize(300).setMaxIter(5)

val featureExtractor = new Pipeline()
  .setStages(Array(tokenizer, cv, idf, w2v))
  .fit(train)
  
featureExtractor.write.overwrite.save("/home/eduuser/model/feature_extractor")

paragraphs.title: TF 모델 훈련
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.classification.{NaiveBayes, LinearSVC}

val tfNB = new NaiveBayes()
    .setFeaturesCol("tf")
    .setLabelCol("label")
    .fit(trainFeature)
//tfNB.save("/eduuser/model/tf-nb")
tfNB.write.overwrite().save("/eduuser/model/tf-nb")
    
val tfSVC = new LinearSVC()
    .setFeaturesCol("tf")
    .setLabelCol("label")
    .fit(trainFeature)
//tfSVC.save("/eduuser/model/tf-svc")
tfSVC.write.overwrite().save("/eduuser/model/tf-svc")

paragraphs.title: TF-IDF 모델 훈련
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.classification.{NaiveBayes, LinearSVC}

val tfidfNB = new NaiveBayes()
    .setFeaturesCol("tfidf")
    .setLabelCol("label")
    .fit(trainFeature)
tfidfNB.write.overwrite().save("/eduuser/model/tfidf-nb")

val tfidfSVC = new LinearSVC()
    .setFeaturesCol("tfidf")
    .setLabelCol("label")
    .fit(trainFeature)
tfidfSVC.write.overwrite().save("/eduuser/model/tfidf-svc")

paragraphs.title: Logistic Regression, MLP 분류기 훈련
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.classification.{LogisticRegression, LinearSVC, MultilayerPerceptronClassifier}

val vecLR = new LogisticRegression()
    .setFeaturesCol("vector")
    .setLabelCol("label")
    .fit(trainFeature)
vecLR.write.overwrite.save("/eduuser/model/vec-lr")

val vecMLP = new MultilayerPerceptronClassifier()
    .setFeaturesCol("vector")
    .setLabelCol("label")
    .setLayers(Array(300, 128, 64, 32, 2))
    .fit(trainFeature)
vecMLP.write.overwrite.save("/eduuser/model/vec-mlp")

val vecSVC = new LinearSVC()
    .setFeaturesCol("vector")
    .setLabelCol("label")
    .fit(trainFeature)
vecSVC.write.overwrite.save("/eduuser/model/vec-svc")
